snippet.title: Pecan Pies in Pumpkin Shells
snippet.description: This fun recipe is perfect for this time of year. From harvest time to Halloweeen to Thanksgiving, these little pies are both cute and delicious. My own mother has made them for dinners and she uses the tiny gourds that...

snippet.title: Pumpkin Pie
snippet.description: Pumpkin pie is a must-have on everyone's Thanksgiving table. I love this recipe because the custard is soft and smooth and doesn't require the use of canned milk. But it's also simple enough that my children can practic...

snippet.title: Frozen Pumpkin Mousse Pie
snippet.description: While pumpkin pie deserves respect as a Thanksgiving icon, its fun to shake up tradition. Surprise your family and friends with a frozen pie this yearit just might become one of their holiday favorites.

snippet.title: Mickey's Pumpkin Whoopie Pies
snippet.description: This fall, whip up a snack that will have Mickey fans whooping it up -- frosting-filled pumpkin whoopie pies shaped just like the Mouse.

snippet.title: Butternut Squash Pie
snippet.description: This kid-friendly recipe makes a tasty alternative to traditional pumpkin pie.

snippet.title: Pumpkin Crunch
snippet.description: While I love the idea of 'dump cakes,' I dislike the artificial ingredients in store bought cake mix. When I found organic cake mix at my local Trader Joe's, I thought I'd give it another go, using my favorite pumpkin p...

snippet.title: Iced Pumpkin Cookies
snippet.description: Soft and cakey, topped with a cream-cheese drizzle, these are the best pumpkin cookies! Try Anne Coleman's delicious recipe today.

snippet.title: Sweet Potato Pie with Praline Sauce
snippet.description: Sweet potato pie is a staple in the deep South, and pralines are the most popular candy in New Orleans. Get the recipe for this classic Louisiana dessert here.

snippet.title: Thanksgiving Dinner Recipes
snippet.description: Find delicious Thanksgiving dinner recipes at Disney Family.com. Holiday favorites such as pumpkin pie, pecan pie, roast turkey, mashed potatoes, green bean casserole, sweet potatoes, side dishes, and appetizers the who...
